automatically_update_extension.description: Checks if the extension is out of date, and automatically updates it (if disabled, it will just never update).

enable_stylesheets.description: Styles the ECHO website with custom styling.

custom_background.description: Changes the websites background to anything you want.

replace_standards_with_percents.description: Replaces the Standard-base Grades (SBG) with the normal Percentage-base grades (PBG).

automatically_login.description: Prevents you from being logged out by always logging you back in (requires account password).

hide_courses.description: Hides courses that you do not need/want in the course feed.
